articles.description: The big horror news of the week was that Halloween: The Game, an official video game based on John Carpenter’s original horror classic, is headed our way next year from Illfonic, and it will feature online multiplayer, offline bots, and a single-player story …

articles.title: Apple-Google Talks Heating Up Over Siri-Gemini IPhone Agreement? - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Google stock rose Friday amid a report Apple and Alphabet are in talks over a Gemini-Siri iPhone deal as well as a Meta cloud computing pact.

articles.title: Microsoft tests letting you resume Android apps on Windows 11 - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is testing a new Windows 11 feature that will let you resume your Android apps on your PC, starting with Spotify.

articles.title: 'Star Trek: Voyager - Across The Unknown' will turn Voyager's seven-year journey into a rogue-lite survival game (video) - Space
articles.description: We didn't know we needed a new 'Star Trek: Voyager' game announcement in 2025, but 'Across The Unknown' looks like a dream 'Trek' game.
